```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(hrbrthemes)

```

```{r}

fest <- read.csv("panorama-des-festivals(2).csv", encoding = "UTF-8", sep = ";")

```

```{r}
fest <- fest %>% 
  group_by(Domaine) %>% 
  count(Date.de.création, name = "nbr")
```

```{r}
fest <- fest %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Date.de.création, y=nbr, group=Domaine, color=Domaine)) +
    geom_line()
```
